author: pipermerriam
content: Anyone have numbers on the rough current size of the post-merge historical data?

author: kolbyml
content: <@364458974906548225>  all post-merge data as seen from E2HS files is 448.747GB, so index 1896 to 2741. All the history is 913.767GB. This includes proofs anchoring the header though, but this should give a good idea. All the data is compressed with snappy as well for context
